options.name: Arm/Hand
options.effect: Can no longer use two-handed weapons. Disadvantage on skill checks best done with two hands.

options.name: Leg
options.effect: Subtract 10 from walking speed, half swimming speed, disadvantage on Jump, half jump distance.

despairManifestations.name: Faded
despairManifestations.description: You become less corporeal and deal only half damage.

despairManifestations.name: Choice Paralysis
despairManifestations.description: When presented with a choice, you are incapable of making it and will defer to anyone else who does.

despairManifestations.name: Vulnerability
despairManifestations.description: Become vulnerable to a damage type.

despairManifestations.name: Deformed
despairManifestations.description: Your body develops a physical manifestation of Despair (horns, claws, harpoon arms, etc.).

despairManifestations.name: Debt
despairManifestations.description: Someone or something saves you; it will collect on that debt later.

despairManifestations.name: Tormented
despairManifestations.description: All future rolls for Despair are at disadvantage.

despairManifestations.name: Conduit of Despair
despairManifestations.description: Once per session the DM can force you into taking an action. Wisdom save DC 30 to resist. You may not crit on this save.

despairManifestations.name: Broken Bonds
despairManifestations.description: One of your Bonds breaks either due to its destruction or it becomes a Nemesis instead.
